Articles.Content:
I think this may be my favorite plane that I have made yet. Eventually I will have to go back to space...but for now, especially with an update coming soon, I think I will stick to stunts like this. Let me know what you think, this one I cut most my talking out and dropped in one of my tracks to accompany the flight.

Let me know what you think of either!
BTW, no hacks were used, just propellers and ASAS
